name: About
answer: Zinal Raval is an AI & Robotics engineer focused on practical, production-ready AI — LLMs, NLP, RAG, computer vision, and automation — with projects that ship and make impact.

name: Skills
answer: Core strengths across AI/ML (TensorFlow, Scikit-learn, LLaMA, RAG) and Backend (FastAPI, REST, Docker) with data tooling (PostgreSQL, Pandas, NumPy).

name: Resume
answer: You can download her resume as a PDF.

name: Contact
answer: Reach out via email or LinkedIn. GitHub and Kaggle links are also available.

name: Moneyverse
answer: Moneyverse is a FastAPI + Streamlit real-time trading and analytics platform with an in-app AI assistant, WebSockets, market/news APIs, PostgreSQL, and Docker.

name: AR-DMS
answer: AR-DMS is a full-stack AI assistant for parsing PDFs, web pages, and images (OCR) with RAG-based querying, summarization, and decision support.

name: Experience
answer: Recent roles include AI/ML Developer at Prodev Infotech (real-time ML pipelines with FastAPI, HF, and custom LLMs) and MooRopan INDIA PVT. LTD. (content, campaigns, analytics).

name: Achievements
answer: Winner – Reckon 4.0 National Hackathon; SSIP India Funding for Robotic Nurse and Robotic Arm; Regional Finalist – SSIP Hackathon 2022.

name: HistoriAI
answer: HistoriAI is a multilingual, voice-interactive travel assistant with local RAG and TTS. Tech: LLaMA 3, LangGraph, ChromaDB, MMS, TTS.

name: Material Estimator
prompt: Tell me about the Material Estimation project
answer: AI pipeline that extracts room-wise material takeoff from architectural PDFs and outputs CSV with LLM reasoning. Tech: Groq, LLaMA 3, PyMuPDF, pdfplumber, OCR.

name: LinkedIn Scraper
prompt: Tell me about your LinkedIn scraper
answer: Automated LinkedIn profile scraper and business insights with scheduling, proxies, and JSON export. Tech: Selenium, SerpAPI, Python.

name: Text Rewriting (GPT-4 + SBERT)
prompt: Tell me about your text rewriting system
answer: Few-shot GPT-4 rewriting with SBERT-based style/meaning validation and prompt engineering. Tech: GPT-4 (OpenRouter), SBERT.

name: Robotic Nurse
prompt: Tell me about the Robotic Nurse
answer: Smart nursing assistant robot for deliveries and vitals via BLE and sensors. Tech: Arduino, IR Sensors, BLE, Embedded C.

name: Robotic Arm
prompt: Tell me about the Robotic Arm
answer: Programmable robotic arm for precision pick-and-place with real-time control. Tech: Arduino, Servo Motors, Sensors, Embedded Programming.

name: Video Downloader API
prompt: Tell me about the video downloader API
answer: FastAPI wrapper around yt-dlp supporting multi-resolution, concurrency, and metadata. Tech: Python, FastAPI, yt-dlp, Pydantic.

name: Face Swapping
prompt: Tell me about the real-time face swapping project
answer: Real-time face swapping using facial landmarks and deep features. Tech: Dlib, OpenCV, DeepFaceLive, NumPy.

name: Food Classification
answer: Food image classification with calorie estimation. Tech: ResNet50, Keras, TensorFlow, ImageNet, NumPy.

name: Healthcare Billing Audit
prompt: Tell me about healthcare billing analysis
answer: Automated billing audit with anomaly detection and reporting. Tech: Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib, Regex, Python Automation.

name: Cat vs Dog Classifier
prompt: Tell me about the cat vs dog classifier
answer: CNN model for cat vs dog classification with attention to overfitting and validation. Tech: TensorFlow, Keras, Image Augmentation.

name: Movie Recommendation
prompt: Tell me about your movie recommendation system
answer: Hybrid TF-IDF + SVD recommender for personalized suggestions. Tech: Scikit-learn, Pandas, TF-IDF, SVD.

name: Customer Segmentation
answer: K-Means clustering with PCA and visualization to identify high-value segments. Tech: K-Means, PCA, Seaborn, Scikit-learn.

name: Spam Classification
answer: NLP-based spam detection with TF-IDF features and classic classifiers. Tech: TF-IDF, Logistic Regression, Scikit-learn.
